name: Immortal Shieldbow
passive: Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a shield and bonus Attack Damage for 8 seconds (90 second cooldown).
description: Item that provides Attack Damage, Attack Speed. Passive effect: If you would take damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a shield and bonus Attack Damage for 8 seconds (90 second cooldown).. Great for champions looking to maximize their damage output.
tips: Perfect for enhancing your team's capabilities
Helps protect and empower your carries
The active/passive effect can turn the tide of team fights
Great for champions who want to maximize their damage output
Synergizes well with other damage items for burst potential
